WorkItem.Summary: [Items] Not downloading Frost Lord's Battle Shroud

Comments.Message: Fixed. Item lookups on EA were broken. Should be working now.

Not fixed.  Still getting the same issue..will not load my cloak.  Tried different browsers, tried reloading the page a couple times, same issue.  I manually cleared Rawr3 from Silverlight's cache and reallocated/reinstalled Rawr3.  On first load of my character, I get the following two (2) errors, and now my Shoulders and Chest won't load:
